# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its users and has exceptional features. Given its quality and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all its merits, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it can bring to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
